intro.title: Studio Log
intro.description: Essays and dispatches from the Nirakara bench, updated monthly.

posts.title: Working Silver in Monsoon Humidity
posts.excerpt: Our bench jewellers switch to low-heat soldering and longer pickle baths as the coastal humidity rises. Here is how the workflow adapts without compromising finish.

posts.title: Partnering with Negombo Fishery Collectives
posts.excerpt: We source oyster shell buttons and pearl seconds from a cooperative that reinvests in reef rehabilitation. This is their story and why we pay above-market rates.

posts.title: The Archive Ring Sizes We Track
posts.excerpt: A nerdy dive into the data we collect on ring sizing per geography and how it informs limited runs for each drop.
